AncestralStateTreeLikelihood

public AncestralStateTreeLikelihood(PatternList patternList,
                                    TreeModel treeModel,
                                    SiteModel siteModel,
                                    BranchRateModel branchRateModel,
                                    boolean useAmbiguities,
                                    boolean storePartials,
                                    DataType dataType,
                                    java.lang.String tag,
                                    boolean forceRescaling,
                                    boolean useMAP,
                                    boolean returnML)
Constructor. Now also takes a DataType so that ancestral states are printed using data codes

Parameters:
patternList - -
treeModel - -
siteModel - -
branchRateModel - -
useAmbiguities - -
storePartials - -
dataType - - need to provide the data-type, so that corrent data characters can be returned
tag - - string label for reconstruction characters in tree log
forceRescaling - -
useMAP - - perform maximum aposteriori reconstruction
returnML - - report integrate likelihood of tip data
